frontmatter.title: Guidelines for handling i18n in Angular
frontmatter.description: This post contains a set of statements on how to tag particular element with i18n and cases developer needs to consider while coding.

frontmatter.title: Insights into Angular ng-template, ngTemplateOutlet
frontmatter.description: Angular uses ng-template, ng-content extensively. It becomes sometimes confusing how to use this concepts and more importantly when to use it. We will see a use case where ng-template powers us to reuse a card component inside a carousel and a grid view.
